title: Creative Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons milk', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '200g porridge oats', '170g plain chocolate chips', '120g chopped almonds (optional)']
